# Miscellaneous JS 

## Web Scraping 

1. First create a new folder and run `npm init -y` to set up a `package.json` file. 

2. Next we install two packages with `npm install axios cheerio`.  Axios is promise based HTTP client for the browser and node.js.  Cheerio is like jQuery for node.js - it makes it easier to select, edit, and view DOM elements.
